Equinix Platform
description:
Equinix Platform
When you build your digital business platform with Equinix, you dynamically interconnect with the world’s largest ecosystem of people, clouds, data and things. With 210+ International Business Exchange™ IBX® data centers on 5 continents and 99.9999% global uptime, Platform Equinix™ gives you unparalleled access to 52 major markets and lets you reach every destination on demand.

Performive
description:
Performive
Performive is the Secure, VMware-centric Managed Multicloud Provider Built for Mid-Size Companies. Mid-sized companies across the globe are faced with changing internal processes and customer expectations. With limited internal IT staff and fixed budgets, delivering on these expectations is an impossible challenge. Performive specializes in partnering with growing SMBs and Mid-sized companies by delivering secure, VMware-based cloud solutions, along with on-demand engineering resources and 24/7/365 Devoted Customer Support.
